entity.name: Jason Kenney
entity.description: Leader of the United Conservative Party in Alberta, Jason Kenney

text:
Jason Kenney has been acting like doctors are enemies and oil will save the day. I did a deep dive for @vicecanada to see how that's working out for him—and us. (Before you @ me, I'm a born and raised Albertan.)
https://t.co/85dkInmCUh
